name: auto-using
description: Provides intellisense for and imports references from all available sources.
author: Fudge

autousing.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

commands.title: Auto-Using: Clean Memory Of Commonly Used Completions

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && cd server/AutoUsing && dotnet publish -c Release && cd .. && cd .. && webpack --mode production
scripts.compile-everything: dotnet build -r win10-x64 server/AutoUsing && webpack --mode none
scripts.compile-everything-test: tsc -b && dotnet build -r win10-x64 server/AutoUsing && dotnet restore client/src/test/playground
